data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Čiampor, Fedor, Laššová, Kristína, Maier, Crystal A., Čiamporová-Zaťovičová, Zuzana, Kodada, Ján (2016): Phanoceroides Hinton, 1939: description of new species, morphology of larvae, and revised taxonomic position of the genus (Coleoptera: Elmidae) based on molecular evidence. Zootaxa 4117 (2): 277-288, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4117.2.9|1 occurrence
